title: Hrithik Roshan's Transformation For 'War' Is Nothing Short Of Inspiring & Here's Proof!
text:
'No pain, no gain', is an adage that fits in perfectly in Hrithik Roshan's life. Despite the challenges that come his way, Hrithik continues to inspire for reasons more than one.

When it comes to getting into the skin of his characters, no one does it better than him.

Be it getting his Bihari accent right for Super 30 or working on a chiselled body for War, Hrithik has done justice to almost everything he took up. On Thursday, Hrithik had a message that was truly deep and meaningful.

Sharing a glimpse of his transformation journey for his film, Hrithik captioned the video as, "The other side of K.A.B.I.R."

In the video snippets, fan can catch a glimpse of every rigorous training session that Hrithik had to undergo. He also suffered from slip-disc, because of which he had to work extra hard in order to change the look he sported in Super 30. He was seen sporting a lean look in the film.



On the work front, War has created seven new records including one for a Gandhi Jayanti release, a film released on Navratri and the highest-grossing in its first three days for Hrithik Roshan, Tiger Shroff and Siddharth Anand, who is the director.

Lastly, this is the fifth Yash Raj Films to cross Rs 100 crore plus net box-office collection over the third day after Dhoom 3, Sultan, Tiger Zinda Hai and Thugs of Hindostan. The high-octane film that also stars Vaani Kapoor opposite Hrithik, shows the two superstars pitted in a massive showdown.
